title: Ashai koNDEnE
sahitya:
Ashai koNDEnE ArumukhanE nAn aruL unadaip-peravE perugi en manadinAlum


anupallavi

  nIca nilaiyazhuttum pAshattai ozhittu kAsu paNa mOhak-kAma krOdham pOkkum


caraNam    nAsha vazhi kATTi naraka vEdanai UTTum mOsamighunda pala Ashai en manadil
mAsenappaDiyAl vIsu pugazh vElA un dAsanAga bhakti vishvAsattODu vAzhum
